name: Four Islands
description:
this is my first game under the name magicdweedoo.

as is common with many first games, the concept and scope was beyond my skill level at the time, and it was therefore shelved indefinitely.

now, almost 10 years later, i present the most recent build of four islands.

as you play through, you may notice strong influences from games that shaped my very being.

it may contain a few bugs, so there is the classic R-key to reset the level if you get stuck.

the game basically exists to accompany a game soundtrack i wrote, so in a way, the game was designed by the music. this backwards way of designing to fit existing music has carried over into many of my subsequent games.

here are snippets of 'done up' versions of some of the songs that were to be featured in the game:

anyway, i hope at the very least it is somewhat interesting!
